resources.string:
Lightning is a blazing fast launcher that is customizable to the extreme. 
It's light on memory and never slows down. 
 
You're not restricted to pages anymore. Instead, your desktop is a beautiful work of art on an infinite canvas. 
The possibilities are endless. 
 
Major features include: 
•Different layouts and grid sizes for both portrait and landscape orientation 
•Panels, scrollable desktops on top of your current page 
•The ability to pin items so they never move 
•Box settings: customize the background color, borders, and margins of any item 
•Free mode: A grid? What's that? Free mode gets rid of the lines, and allows for rotation of items 
•Multiple desktop grids 
•22 different gestures with 29 different actions (which can also be launched with shortcuts) 
•Use one of your desktops as your lockscreen! (beta only) 
•Stop points: tell Lightning when to stop scrolling 
•Custom scroll directions 
•Full control over any item, including: 
1. text font, shadow and color 
2. custom icons from your gallery, plus scale and inner scale 
3. choose how close and what side your icon is to your label 
4. box settings, with support for .9.png as the background (look this up. .9s are cool.) 
5. transparency, and direction gestures to launch any action (ex. Swipe up on the Chrome Icon launches Dolphin Browser) 
•Save your custom desktop to either a full backup or as a style option 
•Export your setup as an APK 
------ 
Lightning does support transparency of the status and navigation bars available in KitKat. 
------ 
As with most power tools like Tasker and such, Lightning has a bit of a learning curve. But there's no other launcher which offers the power of Lightning. 
 
Zap! 
 
Any comments, suggestions, and bug reports are welcome. 
You can email me, Pierre Hébert, at pierrox@pierrox.net. 
If you'd like, join our G+ page to get feedback from other users, discuss features, have questions answered, or enter the beta testing group. 
Help files can be found online by long-pressing on any setting.

Lightning Launcher is a lightweight and extremely customizable home screen replacement for Android.

You are now running in normal mode, meaning that some advanced options are hidden. Switch to expert mode to access all features and options (General settings).

LL is now preparing the list of apps once and for all.

Thank you for reading and using LL!
Long-press to add stuff into this folder \nCustomize the folder item itself for more options
App update news, suggest a feature, or report a bug
A highly advanced All Apps page.
Create or update your own language pack
Enter edit mode after adding an item
This will shorten the time it takes to load, but uses more memory
This style has fewer columns than the current one. Continue and reorganize items ?
Permission denied. For call shortcuts please install the LL direct call plugin
Select a wallpaper, its tint color, or enable scrolling
Choose item placement mode (free/grid), grid size
When adding an item, detach it from grid automatically
Allow items to have two positions: one in portrait mode (primary), and another one in landscape
Always stop scrolling at a page boundary
Desktop only scrolls as far as the items go
Only scroll in one direction at a time
Pinch to zoom in or out
Close the folder as soon as one of its app is launched
Add a 1 pixel padding to fix a glitch that appears on some versions of Android
Overwrite current config with a style
Save current config to a style
Removes all items and loads the default style
Large scale uses a lot more memory. Use with caution.
Select one or more areas, \nthen choose color/size below
Enter edit mode to select a disabled item
Might affect performance. 0 is completely transparent.
Preview mode \n(this might differ from the real thing)
Preview mode \nYou can\'t actually do anything here
Backup error, please check that there is enough storage space on the sdcard
Restore error, please check that the backup archive is valid and can be read
Do you really want to delete this desktop?\nThis cannot be undone.
The system wallpaper works across your entire Android device
This wallpaper overrides the system one, and can differ between desktops
To get help on a setting, long-press on it.
Rearrange, delete, add, and select default desktops

The "My Drawer" view lets you fully customize your app drawer. 
 
In this mode, items can be freely moved around, and folders can be used to organize apps. 
 
Try zooming out and selecting "Edit layout": apps can be put on left, right, top and bottom pages too, letting you manage apps in your very own way.
empty folder \nDrag and drop items into the folder
An installation of Lightning Launcher has been detected.\n\nAll data will now be imported. When this is done you can safely uninstall the classic version and use this one instead.
Something went wrong during file copy!
Close the app drawer upon app launch
Apply an icon pack or revert to default icons
Select and apply an icon pack
Works with icon packs designed for ADW and a few others
This icon pack as no app/icon table
This includes inner scale and icon effects.
Item is not installed. Search Google Play, or pick another app?
Swap items if they overlap (grid mode only)
Warning: please read the help first (long press)
Go to home desktop, then zoom 100p.
Browse and apply templates, export for APK
Load it from an installed APK
Long tap to read the tutorial
This template has been designed for a newer version of Lightning Launcher, would you like to update now ?
The template is ready to be applied but some warnings have been found:
• this template has been designed with the full version of Lightning Launcher, it may use some features not available in this version.
• this template does not exactly match your screen characteristics. Some elements may be scaled and displayed incorrectly, or look blurry.
• your device is not able to restore widgets automatically, you will need to manually recreate them.
Couldn\'t find the widget :( \nTap to pick another one
Honor pinned items in edit mode
Stop points are always displayed, even in normal mode
Allow only a single opened folder at a time
Use the desktop size to compute the cell size, not the panel size
Select the desktop to be shown on the lock screen. Long tap for a tutorial.
Select or disable the lock screen
Select a desktop, tap and cancel to disable it
The lock screen has been disabled.
The Unlocker Plugin is not installed yet. Tap to install
Before to lock, please ensure that this desktop can be unlocked safely, either using an unlocker or an \"Unlock screen\" action.
Stop points conflict with the \'Snap to page\' option: it has been automatically turned off.
Rotate the item upon screen rotation
Unknown or deleted script, a new one has been created.
This script may be in use in other actions. Are you sure to delete it ?
Replace: fully replace the current setup
Merge: keep the current setup, import the template as new desktops
Update: keep desktops and items, apply style from desktops in the template only
Apps launched from the lock screen will unlock at the same time
The desktop can be scrolled beyond its limit
Identify this item with a name
Unleash the power of LL by displaying advanced options
Warning: script execution is currently disabled in general settings

Your apps are here.
You can launch apps from there and start adding apps to the desktop: long press on some app and select "Add to launcher".

Tap to learn more.

You just added a folder. Folders can contain apps, widgets or even other folders.

Drag some item over it, wait a bit for the move to be confirmed (at the end of the animation), then drop the object: it will be moved inside the folder.

Tap to learn more on folders.

Your first panel is here.
A panel behaves a bit like a folder: drag item over it, wait a bit for the move to be confirmed (end of the animation), then drop the object.

Tap to learn more on panels.

This is your desktop. Long tap to add objects (apps, widgets, folders, more) and access settings.

Pages are created as soon as you drag objects over them: to the left and right sides, but also to the top and bottom sides.

Tap to learn more on LL concepts.
Display the action bar on scroll
When reaching a side, items from the other side are displayed as if the desktop were a sphere
Use alpha to adjust the saturation
Set status and navigation bars visibility, transparency, etc.
Constraint the ripples inside the item\'s boundaries

A side bar is a customized folder. Drop items here to move them into the side bar. Tap on the icon to toggle the side bar, or assign it to a gesture or any other event. Change the window alignment values to dock it on other sides.
A page indicator displays the current page position in the desktop. By default this is item pinned and not clickable. Enter the edit layout mode first to change its style, color, etc.
A stop point is a tool to create custom scrolling scheme: the desktop will stop scrolling at stop points. Long tap on a stop point to edit its properties. Stop points are only visible in edit mode.

A bookmark saves the current position and scale of your desktop. Once the bookmark has been created you can move it anywhere else, tapping on it will automatically bring you back to the memorized desktop position. It works inside panels and folders too!
Swipe from the left edge to reveal the drawer

The seamless mode is automatically disabled in edit mode, otherwise empty pages wouldn\'t be reachable. Be aware that some items may then suddenly disappear when entering edit mode: they are just displayed at their original position in the desktop instead of being "wrapped".\nSeamless mode is enabled again when exiting edit mode.

Hint: in order to create a new page, simply add or drag some item on it.
This works for pages above and below too, try it!

(you can safely delete this hint)
Hint: use one or two fingers swipe up to reveal the user menu (you can customize it), long tap somewhere to display a contextual menu.\n\n(you can safely delete this hint)
The Script Importer is not installed
Would you like to install it from the Play Store?
At least one category need to be selected…
Please unlock Lightning to use this feature

Upgrade to the Full Lightning version to benefit from more features:

- Advanced app drawer (folders, action bar, categories).
- Add, remove, rearrange desktops at will.
- Per desktop wallpaper.
- Unread count, badges and dynamic text.
- Customizable lock screen.
- Integrated app killer.

If you already unlocked Lightning in the past, please select "OK" to re-activate this version.
This feature is not available in the trial version
Upgrade to get the most out of Lightning

Thank you for testing Lightning!

The app will run in trial mode for 7 days: all features are enabled and can be used without restriction during this period. After the trial period, the app will still be usable but editing will not be enabled anymore.

If you like this app and wish to support it, please consider purchasing the key to unlock it.

Thank you!

Lightning need your feedback!

Would you like to take a few seconds to rate this app on the Play Store?
This is a sample lock screen that you can customize at will.\nAdd apps or widgets then activate it through the lock screen settings (tap here).
Please read the documentation before to change this value
Custom views are designed for advanced use cases. It enables Android view creation through scripting and as a consequence it requires advanced scripting and Android knowledge.
One or more widget will be deleted. Widget deletion cannot be fully undone and you may have to recreate the widget content. Do you wish to continue?
Style copied, now use \'Paste the style\' to replicate it.
I think I already told you there were no script ;-)
Please do not insist, there is no script here.
Well, that\'s enough, please stop. Otherwise I\'ll have to create a script.
OK, if this is the only way to be in peace, let\'s go, I will now create a script…
No custom view.\nTap to try again.
Switching to \'My Drawer\' view for customization
Display a desktop above other apps
Select or disable the floating desktop
Select a desktop, tap and cancel to disable it
For debug purpose only (green: show, red: hide)
The floating desktop is hidden when launching an app
The floating desktop has been disabled
Changes will take effect on next load
Set a custom label\n(basic HTML is allowed)
The overlay desktop requires the permission to draw over other apps
When locked, the floating desktop is disabled. It is re-enabled upon unlock.
To accomplish this task, Lightning Launcher needs your permission:
look for backup and templates archives on the external storage
write backups and templates on the external storage
read font files on the external storage
read images on the external storage
store extracted images on the external storage
extract template files to temporary storage
make the script available on external storage so that another editor can read it
query the phone call log for missed calls
read the number of unread SMS
directly dial a phone number from the home screen

Starting at January 9th, 2019, due to Google policy changes, launchers are not allowed anymore to display unread sms and missed phone calls count.\n\nFortunately Lightning offers a workaround to re-enable this feature. Please hit the "OK" button to re-enable the feature.
Would you like to install a permission package?
The container is now locked and can\'t be modified. Long tap an empty space and select unlock to enable editing again.
The user menu is not available in the app drawer.
Please select a desktop\nfor your live wallpaper
React to touches as a normal app, allowing wallpaper swipe and scroll
The Lightning Live Wallpaper is not yet enabled\n\nSupport the developer and help making Lightning the best launcher ever!
No app shortcut for this item

In order to access app shortcuts, Lightning Launcher needs to be the default launcher, otherwise it has no app shortcut permission.\n\nNote: you may see this message twice before you can select \'Always\' in the launcher selection box.
view, create, edit, delete and run scripts in Lightning Launcher
Script disabled. Open it in the editor to enable again
